description: The Zune Dock Pack gives you everything you need to display and charge your Zune anywhere in your home or office. You can charge your Zune while you listen to music with the Dock that includes a longer cable to accommodate your home setup. Another charging option is the smaller AC adapter; at half the size of the original, it is more portable and easily fits into crowded power strips. For added convenience, the cable plugs into the side so it can fit behind dressers and tables. It is compatible with the Zune 4 GB, Zune 8 GB, Zune 30 GB, and Zune 80 GB. And for Zune 80 GB owners, you can purchase additional component video cables to watch movies in 480i using this kit.What's in the Box:Zune Dock, three faceplates (one for each device type), Zune AC adapter, product quick start guide, product manual.
title: Zune Dock Pack v2 (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
